00145 template <class ViewBase>
00146 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::UpdateFitTransform()
00147 {
00148        if (m_framePtr->m_isZoomToFit){
00149               m_framePtr->m_isZoomToFit = false;
00150               switch (m_framePtr->m_fitMode){
00151               case Frame::FM_RESET:
00152                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_RESET);
00153                      break;
00154 
00155               case Frame::FM_BOTH:
00156                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_FIT);
00157                      break;
00158 
00159               case Frame::FM_HORIZONTAL:
00160                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_FIT_H);
00161                      break;
00162 
00163               case Frame::FM_VERTICAL:
00164                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_FIT_V);
00165                      break;
00166 
00167               case Frame::FM_UNPROP:
00168                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_FIT_UNPROP);
00169                      break;
00170 
00171               case Frame::FM_COVER:
00172                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_FIT_COVER);
00173                      break;
00174               }
00175               m_framePtr->m_isZoomToFit = true;
00176        }
00177 
00178        CalcBoundingBox();
00179 
00180        i2d::CRect boundingBox = GetBoundingBox();
00181        if (boundingBox != GetBoundingBox()){
00182               OnBoundingBoxChanged();
00183        }
00184 }

00187 template <class ViewBase>
00188 bool TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::OnMouseMove(istd::CIndex2d position)
00189 {
00190        bool retVal = BaseClass::OnMouseMove(position);
00191 
00192        Frame::CursorInfo info;
00193 
00194        // pixel position
00195        const iview::CScreenTransform& transform = GetTransform();
00196        info.pixelPos = transform.GetClientPosition(position);
00197 
00198        // color info
00199        int backgroundLayerIndex = GetBackgroundLayerIndex();
00200        if (backgroundLayerIndex >= 0){
00201               const iview::CSingleLayer* layerPtr = dynamic_cast<const iview::CSingleLayer*>(&GetLayer(backgroundLayerIndex));
00202               if (layerPtr != NULL){
00203                      const iview::CImageShape* backgroundShapePtr = dynamic_cast<const iview::CImageShape*>(layerPtr->GetShapePtr());
00204                      if (m_framePtr->IsPixelValueVisible() && backgroundShapePtr != NULL){
00205                             const iimg::IBitmap* bitmapPtr = dynamic_cast<const iimg::IBitmap*>(backgroundShapePtr->GetModelPtr());
00206                             if (bitmapPtr != NULL){
00207                                    istd::CIndex2d bitmapPos = info.pixelPos.ToIndex2d();
00208                                    ibase::CSize bitmapSize = bitmapPtr->GetImageSize();
00209                                    if (                 (bitmapPos.GetX() >= 0) &&
00210                                                                (bitmapPos.GetY() >= 0) &&
00211                                                                (bitmapPos.GetX() < bitmapSize.GetX()) &&
00212                                                                (bitmapPos.GetY() < bitmapSize.GetY())){
00213                                           int pixelMode = bitmapPtr->GetPixelFormat();
00214 
00215                                           I_BYTE* linePtr = (I_BYTE*)bitmapPtr->GetLinePtr(bitmapPos.GetY());
00216 
00217                                           int x = bitmapPos.GetX();
00218                                           
00219                                           switch (pixelMode){
00220                                                  case iimg::IBitmap::PF_GRAY:
00221                                                  {
00222                                                         info.pixelBrightness = linePtr[x] * 100 / 255;
00223                                                         break;
00224                                                  }
00225 
00226                                                  case iimg::IBitmap::PF_RGB:
00227                                                  {
00228                                                         info.red = linePtr[x] * 100 / 255;
00229                                                         info.green = linePtr[x + 1] * 100 / 255;
00230                                                         info.blue = linePtr[x + 2] * 100 / 255;
00231                                                         break;
00232                                                  }
00233 
00234                                                  case iimg::IBitmap::PF_RGBA:
00235                                                  {
00236                                                         info.red = linePtr[x] * 100 / 255;
00237                                                         info.green = linePtr[x + 1] * 100 / 255;
00238                                                         info.blue = linePtr[x + 2] * 100 / 255;
00239                                                         info.alpha = linePtr[x + 3] * 100 / 255;
00240                                                         break;
00241                                                  }
00242                                           }
00243                                    }
00244                             }
00245                      }
00246               }
00247        }
00248 
00249        i2d::CVector2d logPosition;
00250        if (m_framePtr->IsMmPositionVisible()){
00251               const iview::CScreenTransform& logToScreenTransform = GetLogToScreenTransform();
00252 
00253               const iview::ICalibration& calibration = GetCalibration();
00254               const iview::IIsomorphicCalibration* isomorphCalibPtr = dynamic_cast<const iview::IIsomorphicCalibration*>(&calibration);
00255               if (isomorphCalibPtr != NULL){
00256                      isomorphCalibPtr->GetApplyToLog(info.pixelPos, info.logicalPos);
00257               }
00258               else{
00259                      info.logicalPos = logToScreenTransform.GetClientPosition(position);
00260               }
00261        }
00262 
00263        m_framePtr->UpdateCursorInfo(info);
00264 
00265        return retVal;
00266 }

00269 template <class ViewBase>
00270 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::SetEditMode(int mode)
00271 {
00272        if (mode != GetEditMode()){
00273               BaseClass::SetEditMode(mode);
00274               
00275               m_framePtr->UpdateEditModeButtons();
00276        }
00277 }

00280 template <class ViewBase>
00281 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::SetFitArea(const i2d::CRectangle& area)
00282 {
00283        i2d::CRectangle prevFitArea = GetFitArea();
00284 
00285        BaseClass::SetFitArea(area);
00286 
00287        if ((prevFitArea != area) && m_framePtr->IsZoomToFit()){
00288               UpdateFitTransform();
00289        }
00290 }

00298                      const istd::CIndex2d& position,
00299                      const iview::IInteractiveShape& shape,
00300                      bool state)

00306 template <class ViewBase>
00307 bool TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::OnMouseButton(
00308                      const IShapeView& view,
00309                      const istd::CIndex2d& position,
00310                      Qt::MouseButton buttonType,
00311                      bool state,
00312                      const IInteractiveShape* shapePtr)
00313 {
00314        if (!state){
00315               m_framePtr->UpdateButtonsState();
00316        }
00317 
00318        return m_framePtr->OnMouseButton(view, position, buttonType, state, shapePtr);
00319 }

00324 template <class ViewBase>
00325 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::SetBackgroundBufferValid(bool state)
00326 {
00327        BaseClass::SetBackgroundBufferValid(state);
00328        if (!state){
00329               int backgroundLayerIndex = GetBackgroundLayerIndex();
00330               if (backgroundLayerIndex >= 0){
00331                      const iview::CSingleLayer* layerPtr = dynamic_cast<const iview::CSingleLayer*>(&GetLayer(backgroundLayerIndex));
00332                      if (layerPtr != NULL){
00333                             const iview::CImageShape* backgroundPtr = dynamic_cast<const iview::CImageShape*>(layerPtr->GetShapePtr());
00334                             bool isBkActive = (backgroundPtr != NULL) && !backgroundPtr->GetBoundingBox().IsEmpty();
00335                             if ((m_framePtr != NULL) && (isBkActive != m_framePtr->m_isBkActive)){
00336                                    m_framePtr->m_isBkActive = isBkActive;
00337                                    if (m_framePtr->m_isZoomToFit){
00338                                           if (isBkActive){
00339                                                  UpdateFitTransform();
00340                                           }
00341                                           else{
00342                                                  SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_RESET);
00343                                           }
00344                                    }
00345                                    m_framePtr->UpdateButtonsState();
00346                             }
00347                      }
00348               }
00349        }
00350 }

00353 template <class ViewBase>
00354 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::OnBoundingBoxChanged()
00355 {
00356        if (m_framePtr != NULL){
00357               m_framePtr->OnBoundingBoxChanged();
00358        }
00359 }

00362 template <class ViewBase>
00363 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::OnResize()
00364 {
00365        BaseClass::OnResize();
00366 
00367        UpdateFitTransform();
00368        if (m_framePtr != NULL){
00369               m_framePtr->UpdateComponentsPosition();
00370        }
00371 }
00372 
00373 
00374 template <class ViewBase>
00375 bool TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::CanBeMoved() const
00376 {
00377        if (m_framePtr != NULL){
00378               return !m_framePtr->m_isZoomToFit && BaseClass::CanBeMoved();
00379        }
00380 
00381        return false;
00382 }

00385 // reimplemented (iview::CViewBase)
00386 
00387 template <class ViewBase>
00388 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::CalcBoundingBox() const
00389 {
00390        if (!m_blockBBoxEvent){
00391               m_blockBBoxEvent = true;
00392 
00393               const i2d::CRect& lastBox = GetBoundingBox();
00394               BaseClass::CalcBoundingBox();
00395               if (lastBox != GetBoundingBox()){
00396                      const_cast<TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>*>(this)->OnBoundingBoxChanged();
00397               }
00398 
00399               m_blockBBoxEvent = false;
00400        }
00401        else{
00402               BaseClass::CalcBoundingBox();
00403        }
00404 }
00405 
00406 
00407 // reimplemented (iview::IDisplay)
00408 
00409 template <class ViewBase>
00410 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::OnAreaInvalidated(const i2d::CRect& beforeBox, const i2d::CRect& afterBox)
00411 {
00412        BaseClass::OnAreaInvalidated(beforeBox, afterBox);
00413 
00414        if (!m_blockBBoxEvent){
00415               m_blockBBoxEvent = true;
00416               i2d::CRect boundingBox = GetBoundingBox();
00417               if (boundingBox != m_lastBoundingBox){
00418                      OnBoundingBoxChanged();
00419                      m_lastBoundingBox = boundingBox;
00420               }
00421 
00422               m_blockBBoxEvent = false;
00423        }
00424 }
